source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a city skyline at sunset. The vast sky is filled with dramatic, scattered clouds painted in warm hues of orange, yellow, and soft grey. Below, the silhouette of the city includes various buildings and lush treetops, creating a tranquil urban landscape under the colorful evening sky.
